Mike Missanelli committed an unintentional violation while interviewing Eagles quarterback Michael Vick on his radio show yesterday. Mike Missanelli reminded Michael Vick that DeSean Jackson made some comments about the quarterback's game-ending interception against the Packers. What's the story with DeSean Jackson ? asked Mike Missanelli "Is he just a young pup who talks out of turn every now and then and you're the wily veteran now, and you have to kinda hit the pup on the nose?"

Larry and Sergey are 10 years older than they were when they thoughtfully hired Eric Schmidt to be the CEO... so everybody's growing up, Vint Cerf said. Google has grown over the past decade from a start-up battling other Internet search engines into a technology giant with nearly 25,000 employees and annual revenue of nearly$ 30 billion.

Our strong performance has been driven by a rapidly growing digital economy and by the extraordinary momentum of our newer businesses, such as display and mobile, Eric Schmidt said. "These results give us the optimism and confidence to invest heavily in future growth- investments that will benefit our users, Google Inc. and the wider web," he said.
